main-text.text: Students around the country are noticing La Salle.
main-text.name: Section-header

main-text.text: Some of them have questions only you can answer.
main-text.name: Section-header

main-text.text: Alumni are the most credible source of information for many prospective students and their parents. That's why we're inviting you to become part of the La Salle Explorer Alumni Recruiting Network (L.E.A.R.N.). There are several ways you can share your La Salle experiences with students and parents:
main-text.name: Text

main-text.text: e Represent the university at college nights and receptions in your area.
main-text.name: List-item

main-text.text: e Call students who are interested in La Salle.
main-text.name: List-item

main-text.text: e Write a letter on company stationery about your work experience and your La Salle education.
main-text.name: List-item

main-text.text: ¢ Visit high schools to discuss your profession and your preparation at La Salle.
main-text.name: List-item

main-text.text: If you are interested in helping the university recruit tomorrow's graduates, please call Maryhelen Driscoll, associate director of admissions, at 215/951-1500. Or return the coupon below.
main-text.name: Text

main-text.text: I'd like to play a role in recruiting students to La Salle.
main-text.name: Text

main-text.text: oe . . Mail to: Office of Admissions La Salle University Philadelphia, PA 19141-1199
main-text.name: Text

main-text.text: LA SALLE EXPLORER ALUMNI RECRUITING NETWORK
main-text.name: Text

main-text.text: La Salle appears in many of the nation's leading guidebooks.
main-text.name: Page-footer
